author: Indhukrishna
body:
This PR has the project dependency changes for updating version of PSDesiredStateConfiguration module. The module has been fixed to enable Dsc configuration compilation on Windows with PowerShell 6.0.0.0

Resolves #4570

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: Do we have tests for this?

comments.author: Indhukrishna
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT We have some tests that we are adding to the other repo. When we make more updates to this module, we will add those tests.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @Indhukrishna it would be great if you can add some basic tests to this repo to make sure things don't accidentally get broken

comments.author: Indhukrishna
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT Got it. Will do as soon as I am back in office.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: @Indhukrishna Please use a rebase merge unless there is a need to preserve the history

title: Update version of PSDesiredStateConfiguration in project files
